value.title: StarCraft 2: The GRAND FINALS Match! (Maru vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Reynor versus Maru in a professional match of StarCraft 2. This is the final game of the Dreamhack StarCraft 2 Masters 2021 Summer Season Finals, the final match of the grand finals of that tournament. In this game Maru decides to play Terran Mech, which is very uncommon. Reynor plays hyper aggressively
